Description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Engineering Department Manager to join our team in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. As an Engineering Department Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing and managing all engineering projects within the organization. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful completion of projects while adhering to strict timelines and budgets. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in engineering and project management, with excellent leadership and communication skills.Responsibilities:Plan, organize, and manage all engineering projects from start to finish
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project scopes, objectives, and deliverables
Develop project plans, including timelines, budgets, and resource allocation
Monitor project progress and ensure adherence to project timelines and budgets
Identify and mitigate risks and issues that may impact project success
Coordinate and communicate with stakeholders, including clients, contractors, and team members
Ensure compliance with all relevant regulations, codes, and standards
Review and approve project designs, drawings, and specifications
Provide technical guidance and support to project teams
Report on project status, including progress, milestones, and challenges, to senior managementSkills
Skills:
Minimum of 9 years of experience in engineering and project management
Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field; Master's degree is preferred
Proven track record of successfully managing and delivering complex engineering projects
Strong leadership and decision-making skills
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Knowledge of industry best practices and regulations
Proficiency in project management software
Fluency in English and Arabic
